{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Frank Tashlin'], 'Producers': ['Harriet Parsons'], 'Starring': ['Dick Powell', 'Debbie Reynolds', 'Anne Francis'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']}
This movie is a cute one n delightful. Airy n lighthearted!~ Debbie Reynolds is ever amusing as she is pretty at heart, plus!~ A super-delightful movie that leaves you feeling uplifted!~
A Happy Heart Movie!~
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stanley Donen', 'Eugene Kelly'], 'Producers': ['Arthur Freed'], 'Starring': ['Eugene Kelly', "Donald O'Connor", 'Debbie Reynolds'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']}
A very very uplifting n happy movie with the three marvelous singin' n dancin' actors! Donald O'Connor is so limber n flexible in his moves n funny as can be in that "Make em Laugh" scene! He's very I'm using to watch! Kelly sings so smooth n his dancing is one of a kind~ It's always so great to watch him in that singin' in the rain review!~ Sweet n cute Debbie is at her best in that dancin' review with the rest of the girls wearing short pink outfits n throwing candy from the huge built in pocket on their hip~ Loved it!~  Light n airy!~ You always get well entertained from watching this movie!~
A Feel Great Movie!
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['ZinnemannFred'], 'Producers': ['Oscar Hammerstein II', 'Arthur Hornblow Jr.', 'Richard Rodgers'], 'Starring': ['Gordon Macrae', 'Gloria Grahame', 'Shirley Jones'], 'Studio': ['Classics']}
When I was a little girl in the mid-1950's, I recall when my grandmother took my mom n two sisters, and I, to see this picture in downtown LA, when it came out in 1955. It was a very delightful musical that we all enjoyed n a very good picture! If you like musicals, (which to say, I'm not a person who is very fond of them), this one you will  honestly like~👍 I recommend one to see it. To me, it was the best "Oklahoma" picture made!~  Frankly,... I never forgot that nostalgic era n time when my wonderful grandma took us to see, "Oklahoma~" Great movie!~
The Best Oklahoma Picture!~
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nathan Hertz'], 'Producers': ['Bernard Woolner'], 'Starring': ['Allison Hayes', 'William Hudson', 'Roy Gordon'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']}
Ay.. A typical 1950ish science-fiction story that's okay if you don't mind it being a smidge cheesey! ... All about a huge lady walking around wanting her husband Harry all to herself- lol!!
Big Lady!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **General Preferences:** The user continues to have a profound passion for classic and vintage cinema, particularly films from Hollywood's golden age, highlighting a nostalgic connection to the genre.

- **Genre Interest:** They remain primarily drawn to comedy and drama while increasingly embracing science fiction, with a noted enjoyment of heartfelt narratives. Their appreciation for musicals is strong, complemented by a growing interest in quirky and captivating storylines within diverse genres.

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user recently rated a vintage film highly, showcasing their enthusiasm for entertaining and feel-good cinema. They describe films as "delightful," "captivating," and "cute and sweet," reflecting their fondness for films that uplift the spirit, and they enjoy the charming qualities that can sometimes be cheesy.

- **Physical Media Format:** The user continues to value collecting DVDs, reinforcing their nostalgic viewing experience and dedication to classic films.

- **Cultural Engagement:** They have a keen interest in cross-cultural narratives and diverse storytelling, enriching their cinematic experiences with varying perspectives and themes.

- **Actor/Director Recognition:** The user deeply admires classic performers and values the artistry of cinema, especially appreciating the talents of beloved actors and their contributions to musicals.

Overall, this profile underscores a user who treasures uplifting storytelling and classic cinema while actively expanding their genre exploration and sharing joyful memories tied to timeless films.
